condition.p: The technology in the classrooms (i.e computers, projector, lights, doc-cam) are not working or working improperly.

cause.title: Poor connection or internal technical issues.

step.cmd: If you are experiencing technology difficulties within Shanks 180 or 360, call the representatives at AirClassroom to notify them of the issue.
After speaking with AirClassroom, call technology assistance at (540)-111-3456.
Follow their instruction or wait for an employee to come to assist you at the classroom.
